objects.text:
• Supports Muscle Recovery
• Improves Sleep Quality
• Enhances Athletic Performance

product_details.name: NATURALTEIN ZMA Supplement | Zinc Magnesium (30 Tablets) |440 mg Magnesium, 17 mg Zinc, 2.4 mg Vitamin B6 | Supports Muscle Recovery, Sleep & Athletic Performance | Heavy Metal Tested
product_details.description: Country of Origin: India. Item part number: ZMA_ZINC_MAG1. Product Dimensions: 4 x 4.5 x 10 cm; 200 g. Item Weight: 200 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 40 x 45 x 100 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 30.0 Count. Generic Name: ZINC MAGNESIUM VITAMIN B6.

banner_details:
The banner features a sleek and modern design to promote a health supplement product. It utilizes a dark gradient background transitioning from black to charcoal gray with soft orange circular and abstract accents, enhancing the visual depth. A white-bold uppercase text layer (`heading`) sits at the top left, followed by a large, bold, orange product name (`subheading`). Below it, a white subtext (`tagline`) highlights the product's key ingredients in a clean, minimal font. A bulleted list (`description`) details the product's benefits. The price (`price`) is prominently displayed in bold orange. A rectangular button (`cta_background`) in orange with black center-aligned text (`cta`) encourages immediate purchase. On the right, a prominently placed product image (`product_image`) reinforces the banner's purpose.

**Color Palette:**
- Background Gradient: #1A1A1A to #333333  
- Accent Orange: #FF9800  
- Deep Orange: #FF5722  
- White Text: #FFFFFF  
- Button Text: #000000
product_color: The product image features a bold and clean color palette that enhances its professional and trustworthy appearance. Primary colors include a rich amber brown (#5C1E12) from the bottle, contrasted with a crisp white label (#FFFFFF) to emphasize clarity. Key text and icons are in black (#000000) and charcoal gray (#333333) for strong contrast and legibility. Bright yellow-orange (#F9A825) highlights “Magnesium” and icons, drawing instant attention and energy. A fresh green (#00A859) is used for the "Glyphosate Free" label, suggesting health and natural qualities. Color blending is minimal, ensuring sharp visual hierarchy while selective highlighting directs focus without overwhelming. Ideal for health-focused banners.
